Infectra


*Infectra frowns. She really didn't know anything about this or =
what to do but her heart took gained force over her brain where she only th=
ought about her love for Airbomber and didn't want to lose him. She slowly =
walks over feeling a bit scared but raises her hands in air with the others=
 but still felt scared*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
 =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2000 12:05 AM
  Subj=
ect: Doom Ice...


  A satsis pod falls in front of the Maximals base. At t=
he same time, Deemos and his group are repaired and come from the CR Chambe=
r, their wounds were fatal but not major. The 6 of them sport a different p=
aint job, all 6 of them are purple, black, and white now. Deemos and his gr=
oup go outside and see the pod. Deemos gives the thumbs up to His comrades.=
 They start to program it.

  "Name?" Deemos asked.

  "It says the name is=
...Tint." Rizopas says. Deemos's smile is huge.

  "Make the name Doom Ice,=
 you can do that, if she was dumb enough to escape in a stasis pod, we repr=
ogram her!" Deemos said.

  "Isn't that what we are against?" Artist asked.=


  "No, Artist, it's not, we are just trying to make more bots good!" Deem=
os replied. Airbomber walks up and sees the pod.

  "What are you guys doin=
g with the pod?" He asked. Suddenly, every one of Deemos' group members had=
 a blaster stuck in Airbomber's face.

  "I say we kill him!" Blender said.=


  "I say we make him join us in our fight!" Diskus said.

  "For once you=
r intelligent, Diskus!" Stronghold said. Airbomber is sweating now, he didn=
't know what that meant but it scared him. Deemos came up from behind him. =
(Don't know if Infectra is there, but I assume she is, if she's not then te=
ll me) Stronghold and Blender target Infectra. Deemos starts to pump some p=
hony info into his mind with the device, and bam! He already looks serious.=


  "Infectra, you might as well leave." Deemos said.

  "I will join you, =
you guys are right, we do need less violence, the war must end, and if ther=
e must be a war to end the war, so be it!" Airbomber said. He turns back to=
 Infectra.

  "Do not worry, Infectra, I still love you, you don't have to =
leave." Airbomber said. Deemos laughed and rubbed his hands together as Riz=
opas reprograms Tint and makes her Doom Ice. Doom Ice is first seen now, sh=
e stands and looks around. Deemos is in a new form, but she reconizes him. =
But, she has no fear, he seems different. She knew of their war, she didn't=
 know how, but she knew. (Reprogrammed and memory addage while she was asle=
ep)

  "I shall join you." Doom Ice said. Deemos looked at his growing grou=
p, A few more and he'll rule the Neo Beast Wars! It's a sure thing! He thou=
ght. He had 8 now, and it felt pretty good. Doom Ice didn't remember Land M=
ine a single bit, and remembered Deemos as your lord and almighty leader.

=
  "For the Maximals, and everyone's protection and peace! Until all...are o=
ne!" Deemos shouted. Doom Ice and Airbomber's hands were raised and the 8 o=
f them raised their hands high in the air. Airbomber waved for Infectra to =
do it to, not caring about what she thought of this group...

-------------=
